# Installation

```bash
npm install @mailerlite/mailerlite-nodejs
```

# Usage

```javascript
// For ECMAScript (ESM)
import MailerLite from '@mailerlite/mailerlite-nodejs';

const mailerlite = new MailerLite({
  api_key: "API_KEY"
});
```

```javascript
// For CommonJS (CJS)
const MailerLite = require('@mailerlite/mailerlite-nodejs').default;

const mailerlite = new MailerLite({
  api_key: "API_KEY"
});
```
